resources.string: Use memory card as download path
The path here cannot be modified. The storage location is:\nMemory card/Android/data/com.imcys.bilibilias/files/download\nNote: Unloading the application will empty the stored data.
At present, audio merging is only a very simple behavior, so it may have a bug, and may cause problems. Please be familiar with it.
This requires you to authorize the folder separately. It needs to be noted that it is only effective for downloading the opera Dash.
Now the cache list of station B will be automatically imported after the download is completed
Automatically import station B after cache completion
Delete the original audio and video files after merging
Set the language displayed by BILIBILIAS
This will anonymously pass the statistical data used by the APP, such as: how to cache, FLV or DASH, to help us optimize the APP.
Upload your usage duration, page dwell time, and region information anonymously, which will help us optimize the APP.
Note: This is an experimental function and will be continuously adjusted.
Set the language in which the software is displayed (test function)
